headline.print_headline: Netflix Investors to Vote on C.E.O.-Chairman Split
headline.main: Netflix Investors to Vote on C.E.O.-Chairman Split

docs.snippet: Shareholders of the media company are to vote Monday on whether to divide the roles of chief executive and chairman, now held by Reed Hastings....
docs.abstract: Shareholders of the media company are to vote Monday on whether to divide the roles of chief executive and chairman, now held by Reed Hastings.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Monday:...
docs.lead_paragraph: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Monday:

headline.print_headline: Dollar Gains Versus Yen on Upbeat Jobs Data, Euro Edges Up
headline.main: Dollar Gains Versus Yen on Upbeat Jobs Data, Euro Edges Up

docs.snippet: The dollar edged up against the yen in early trade on Monday thanks to upbeat U.S. employment data while the euro crept up from multi-month lows, continuing to shake off the impact from the European Central Bank's monetary easing last week....
docs.lead_paragraph: The dollar edged up against the yen in early trade on Monday thanks to upbeat U.S. employment data while the euro crept up from multi-month lows, continuing to shake off the impact from the European Central Bank's monetary easing last week.

headline.print_headline: Asia Stocks Push to Nearly Three-Year High, Dollar Edges Up
headline.main: Asia Stocks Push to Nearly Three-Year High, Dollar Edges Up

docs.snippet: Asian stocks touched their highest levels in nearly three years on Monday, basking in the glow of a record close on Wall Street after bright U.S. jobs data pointed to improving economic momentum....
docs.lead_paragraph: Asian stocks touched their highest levels in nearly three years on Monday, basking in the glow of a record close on Wall Street after bright U.S. jobs data pointed to improving economic momentum.

headline.sub: Gunshots heard and wounded taken to hospital in Karachi airport attack
headline.main: Gunshots heard and wounded taken to hospital in Karachi airport attack

docs.snippet: Rounds of gunfire ring out as the wounded are taken to hospital in Karachi airport attack in which at least five people have been killed. Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rounds of gunfire ring out as the wounded are taken to hospital in Karachi airport attack in which at least five people have been killed. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.print_headline: Police: Burglar Arrested at Sandra Bullock's Home
headline.main: Police: Burglar Arrested at Sandra Bullock's Home

docs.snippet: Police say they arrested a burglar at the Los Angeles home of Sandra Bullock while the actress was there, but she wasn't harmed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say they arrested a burglar at the Los Angeles home of Sandra Bullock while the actress was there, but she wasn't harmed.

docs.snippet: A search resumed Monday morning for 24 students feared drowned after they were swept away by strong waters in a river near a mountainous tourist resort in northern India....
docs.lead_paragraph: A search resumed Monday morning for 24 students feared drowned after they were swept away by strong waters in a river near a mountainous tourist resort in northern India.

docs.snippet: Ben Crane won the St. Jude Classic on Sunday for his first PGA Tour title since 2011, closing with a 3-over 73 for a one-stroke victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ben Crane won the St. Jude Classic on Sunday for his first PGA Tour title since 2011, closing with a 3-over 73 for a one-stroke victory.

headline.print_headline: Dodgers Beat Rockies in Rain-Shortened Game
headline.main: Dodgers Beat Rockies in Rain-Shortened Game

docs.snippet: Hanley Ramirez homered, Clayton Kershaw struck out nine and the Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Colorado Rockies 6-1 Sunday in a game cut short by rain in the sixth inning....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hanley Ramirez homered, Clayton Kershaw struck out nine and the Los Angeles Dodgers beat the Colorado Rockies 6-1 Sunday in a game cut short by rain in the sixth inning.

headline.print_headline: Red Bull Rivalry Overtakes Hamilton, Rosberg Spat
headline.main: Red Bull Rivalry Overtakes Hamilton, Rosberg Spat

docs.snippet: For weeks the Formula One world has been riveted on a feud between championship contenders Nico Rosberg and Lewis Hamilton but after the Canadian Grand Prix on Sunday the Mercedes team mates have another rivalry to worry about....
docs.lead_paragraph: For weeks the Formula One world has been riveted on a feud between championship contenders Nico Rosberg and Lewis Hamilton but after the Canadian Grand Prix on Sunday the Mercedes team mates have another rivalry to worry about.
